transcript.text: chapter 20 the return to portland
despite the chill of a pre winter frost
that covered Southern Missouri's now
naked trees with ice a warrant search of
my heart I could have never imagined
that last summer yah had called me to
abandon everything in California our
semi comfortable life of cleaning houses
to save brotherly the fog and confusion
that had filled my mind for the 90 plus
days that we had lived with the pastor
was blown away as fiercely as the cold
wind that even then blew across the
Midwest indicating winter was soon to
sweep the last messages of fall away but
now a new problem arose where would we
go from here brotherly had contacted
some friends of his that put us up in a
very nice farmhouse the rich oaken
floors warm fireplace sweet fresh Jersey
milk and butter from the cows all
accentuated the love of his family who
barely knew us but trusted Broly enough
to take us in more importantly the
bitterness that had filed this pastor
was now gone and we had a chance to get
our spiritual bearings and recover one
evening as we SAT with the wife at our
dining room table Christmas lights from
her newly decorated Christmas tree
shining upon us she asked us about why
we did not celebrate the holiday well
Christmas really has nothing to do with
the Messiah or his work open the Bible
Jeremiah 10 1 through 6 which described
the precursor of the Christmas tree in
fact Yahshua was born during sukkot
which is a festival commanded first to
keep in the
23 she was very receptive to the truth
and I was amazed at how yah was
continuing to use this whole situation
for good I called both my parents and my
father-in-law to let them know exactly
what had happened I asked them both the
police pray that yah would give us
direction of where to go within 24 hours
my parents promised to send his five
hundred dollars and annika swather
promised to send us another five hundred
dollars more than enough to make the
four-day trip from Missouri back to
Oregon we never asked for the money it
was simply would have been placed on her
parents hearts this was a miracle beyond
miracles I also called an old friend of
mine from Portland jochen on to let him
know what had happened I felt I needed
to update him because he had actually
visited us at the pastor's home for a
couple of days during Tabernacles
explained to him the whole story that
had transpired you know Daniel I'm
working as an independent contractor for
delivery driving business here in
Portland but I'm going to be leaving
soon to help my mom with her tax
business in Boston would you like to
lease the van for me and do delivery
driving I was shocked with the offer yes
of course that would be perfect you and
your family can even stay with us until
you find a place he said in less than
two weeks yah had lined up a job for me
given us the financial means to drive
back to Oregon and provided us with a
temporary place to live until we could
find something more permanent Annika and
I grew more and more excited as the
prospect of returning to portland after
more than three and a half years of
being away became a reality
on the morning of our departure after
thanking our hosts we made a final stop
at brother lease thank you so much thank
you so much for helping us out in so
many ways I said hugging brotherly
fiercely brotherly smiled wiping tears
from his eyes I'm going to miss you guys
very much maybe I'll watch over and
protect you the journey back was
glorious though a winter storm
threatened to engulf the Rocky Mountains
we made it through with no problems in
fact like a gate shutting behind us we
passed through colorado and utah just
ahead of the thick snows once again yah
was placing his hand of protection upon
us he was during this journey back but
yah perk the new song in our hearts
springtime and summer springtime and
fall springtime in winter it's
springtime all year long Thank You
Yahshua but taking my heart's throne
Thank You Yahshua for breathing
I thank you Yahshua but placing the
promised land within me thank you Oh
Yahshua for this eternal spring we sang
this out mile after mile as we made the
journey back home to Oregon it's
standing against the icy bitterness of
the pastor and delivering revelry a new
revival had awoken in our hearts giving
us a joy that was impossible to contain
returning to portland was unlike
anything I've ever experienced I had
become convinced that I would never be
allowed by yah to come back to the city
having fled and disgrace in defeat yet
after living in the California and then
Missouri wilderness for three and a half
years yah had allowed me to return it's
hard to believe we are back in the city
annika whispered to me one day I know I
said it's like we've entered a dream
during the first few weeks of delivery
driving I was learning the ropes of
handling the man how to fill out the
proper forms and of course using the
Thomas guide to figure out where I was
going each day but one morning after
making a delivery in downtown Portland
my dispatcher notified me that I needed
to just sit and wait as they were as
there were no more runs to make at the
moment I realized that I was parked
right across from Portland State
University a place I hadn't visited
three and a half years old memories of
my victories on this campus swelled up
inside of me surely yaad placed me here
for such a time as this stuffing my
radio phone into my jacket I jumped out
of the van strode into the park blocks
and began preaching within minutes y'all
help me draw a crowd of Muslims atheists
Christians and pagans for 30 minutes I
exalted Yahshua in the Torah exhilarated
that I'd return to my old stomping
grounds the crackle from my dispatcher
radio interrupted my preaching and I
jumped back into the van ready to carry
out my next delivery for weeks this
would repeat literally allowing me to do
ministry while on the job after living
for about two months with Yoakam and his
wife and annika only a month away from
giving birth to our fifth child we still
had not found a place of our own our
primary holdup was waiting on purchasing
a house on a beautiful plot of land in
aerial Washington an idyllic property
situated with herb gardens natural
springs and seated in the heart of the
Cascade Mountains but just before we
were convinced that we could close on
the house the underwriter for the lender
pulled back due to structural problems
with bomb even though we said we didn't
care that the house and property were a
dream come true we just simply couldn't
get the financing Annika's grandparents
instead put us in a very luxurious three
bedroom apartment in Vancouver
Washington just north of Portland they
were willing to cover our rent while we
got on our feet honey I want to try and
do this burst without a midwife we don't
really have to we don't really have the
money to afford her anyway Annika was
uneasy are you sure about this yes I
know I can do this I've delivered four
children now a fifth can't be too
difficult I called Monica's midwife and
explain what I wanted to do she agreed
to be on call in case she ran into any
emergencies but after looking over
Annika and seeing everything checked out
in a healthy manner assured us that she
thought we were making the right
decision one Shabbat in mid-march of
2007 Annika now week overdue we decided
to head to one of the tallest waterfalls
in Oregon I've got to get this baby out
Annika declared firmly let's hike to the
top are you sure about that I said
staring up at the raging wonderful it's
more than a mile up it brings on labor
than it's worth it she said we hiked to
the very top naomier Miriam and our
double stroller isaiah elijah walking
along beside us the hope for labor did
not materialize but we did enjoy
beautiful shabbat hike and treasured the
bird's eye view of the gushing wonderful
but a week later in late March our fifth
baby Malachi would not hold back any
longer but the children is asleep my
wife experienced one of her easiest
Labor's only a few hours long I wasn't
exactly sure how to remove the placenta
so I just continue to rub my wife
stomach hoping it would come out just as
I had seen our previous midwives before
the feet but nothing seemed to work
finally I said honey stand on the
blanket and stomp your feet as she did
so the placenta slipped right out onic
and I weren't sure what we were more
product our little baby boy or the fact
that we had just delivered him all by
ourselves Passover that year was a
festive event we invited mark the
student who had given his heart to yah
back in 2002 while I was preaching at
PSU also a musician in his fiance
attending the musician had heard me at
PSU and had been encouraged by the
preaching Passover also happened to fall
in the eighth day from Malachi's
birthday here to this day I don't know
how Hanukkah did it in the space of
eight hours children in tow she brought
Malachi to a naturopath to have him
circumcised stopped by a farm in
hillsboro to pick up her freshly
slaughtered lamb roasted it over an open
fire all day and brought it home by
evening for the Passover Feast I had to
work the whole day doing delivery
driving and I'd even gotten stuck with a
last-minute Twilight delivery forced me
to get home later than I had wanted I
was stunned to see all that Annika had
done a few weeks after Passover we had a
major problem hit us head-on little
Naomi's legs were looking very purplish
and she was crying on stop crying out to
Yashiro for an answer I immediately
received revelation I told Annika to
make some purified water with some trace
mineral powder that we had I
me as Naomi began drinking this the legs
returned to normal within about five
minutes I was rejoicing at this healing
mini miracle 'banahna cos grandparents
were not happy at all her grandfather
sent me an email asking us to take Naomi
to the doctor for a checkup I responded
that we didn't need a doctor the Yad
given us revelation and that it had
worked the sudden disagreement resulted
an honor his grandfather refusing to
continue to pay our rent for the
apartment we've been living I think we
could have probably continued to afford
the rent by creatively managing our
budget but I got a thought in my head
about living in a tent to try and save
finances to this day I don't know what I
was thinking but during the month of May
all five of us lived in a tent on a farm
in northern Oregon
though the children absolutely love the
living situation I could tell this would
not work my commute from the farm to
Portland was over an hour and a half
each way and annika the good spirited
about the situation was not pleased by
June we found another apartment or
Oregon and move everybody him the
tension between on ACCA's family and me
were still very tight still from the
frozen wilds of Missouri to the four day
journey home to the delivery of malachi
to living in a tent yah proved over and
over again one very important thing he
was always with us always protecting us
always helping us his love never fails
